Summarize the text in fewer than 10 sentences. Since the 1970s, education technology—which encompasses technologies used to support teaching and learning—has been an indispensable part of the classroom. From personal computers to interactive whiteboards to virtual learning platforms, education technology has transformed teaching and learning practices and provided new opportunities for students to create, collaborate and connect. However, despite the significant amount of investment in education technology, many of these enhancements haven’t had a substantial impact on student outcomes.
